directions: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Cook onion, bell pepper, and garlic in hot oil until softened, about 5 minutes.
Pour chicken broth over onion mixture; bring to a boil and reduce heat to medium low.
Stir mixed greens, corn, pearl barley, cremini mushrooms, and carrot through the simmering stock.
Cook until barley is tender, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed greens (such as spinach, beet greens, and Swiss chard)
title: Mushroom and Barley Soup
